snippet: Despite his surgeon’s recommendation that he not exceed 180 innings this year, Harvey vowed in an essay for The Players’ Tribune that he would pitch in the playoffs if the Mets reached the postseason.
abstract: Pitcher Matt Harvey says in The Players' Tribune essay that he intends to pitch in the postseason if Mets are eligible.
lead_paragraph: Despite his surgeon’s recommendation that he not exceed 180 innings this year, Harvey vowed in an essay for The Players’ Tribune that he would pitch in the playoffs if the Mets reached the postseason.

headline.main: Matt Harvey Says He Will Pitch On
headline.print_headline: Harvey Says He Will Pitch On
